misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a seasoned competitor from Lakeside Golf Vammala, is known for his strategic play and unwavering focus on the course. He is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, and 2025 will mark his 11th appearance in the event.
Though the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Mikko's dedication and competitive spirit make him a formidable opponent.

Off the course, Mikko is known for his colorful life, having planted his seeds in four different women across four different decades. His ability to balance his personal endeavors with his golfing career is a testament to his unique character.
